name: USDCx Coin
description: The USDCX stablecoin is a fully-backed digital currency designed to provide a stable, secure, and efficient medium of exchange. With the growing demand for cryptocurrencies and blockchain technology, USDCX aims to bridge the gap between traditional finance and the digital economy. This whitepaper outlines the vision, technology, and value proposition of USDCX, positioning it as a leading stablecoin in the market.
